definitions.definition: A misuse of a word ; an application of a term to something which it does not properly denote .

subdefinitions.definition: Such a misuse involving some similarity of sound between the misused word and the appropriate word.

definitions.definition: A misapplication or overextension of a figurative or analogical description ; a wrongly applied metaphor or trope .

main_definition: A misuse of a word ; an application of a term to something which it does not properly denote .
secondary_definitions: ( rhetoric ) A misapplication or overextension of a figurative or analogical description ; a wrongly applied metaphor or trope .
